query.name: Header
query.script: select 'за период с '|| case ${repmonth}::integer when 1 then '€нвар€' when 2 then 'феврал€' when 3 then 'марта' when 4 then 'апрел€' when 5 then 'ма€' when 6 then 'июн€' when 7 then 'июл€' when 8 then 'августа' when 9 then 'сент€бр€' when 10 then 'окт€бр€' when 11 then 'но€бр€' when 12 then 'декабр€' end ||' по '|| case ${repmonthby}::integer when 1 then '€нварь' when 2 then 'февраль' when 3 then 'март' when 4 then 'апрель' when 5 then 'май' when 6 then 'июнь' when 7 then 'июль' when 8 then 'август' when 9 then 'сент€брь' when 10 then 'окт€брь' when 11 then 'но€брь' when 12 then 'декабрь' end ||' '||${repyear}::text||' года' as DATEREPORT

query.name: spec2
query.script: select 'ќбщий итог:' as SUBJECTSDIR_1, SUM((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND DD.benefitchildumber = 1)) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT1_1, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD, benefit01payment p WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND B.ID = P.benefit01id AND P.child01id = D.ID AND DD.benefitchildumber = 1)),0) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT1_SUM_1, SUM((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND DD.benefitchildumber >= 2)) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT2_1, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD, benefit01payment p WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND B.ID = P.benefit01id AND P.child01id = D.ID AND DD.benefitchildumber >= 2)),0) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT2_SUM_1 from BENEFIT01 B LEFT JOIN CHILD D ON B.ID = D.benefit01id INNER JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON B.benefitspacketsid = Z.ID INNER JOIN subjectsdir R ON Z.subjectsdirID = R.ID WHERE ((SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN '€нварь' then 1 WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) >= ${repmonth}::integer --входной параметр or ${repmonthby}::integer >= (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN '€нварь' then 1 WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) ) and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER --входной параметр;

query.name: spec1

select r.name as SUBJECTSDIR1, SUM((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND DD.benefitchildumber = 1)) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT11, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD, benefit01payment p WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND B.ID = P.benefit01id AND P.child01id = D.ID AND DD.benefitchildumber = 1)),0) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT1_SUM1, SUM((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND DD.benefitchildumber >= 2)) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT21, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFITCHILD DD, benefit01payment p WHERE DD.ID = D.benefitchildid AND B.ID = P.benefit01id AND P.child01id = D.ID AND DD.benefitchildumber >= 2)),0) AS CHILDUMBERVIRT2_SUM1
from BENEFIT01 B LEFT JOIN CHILD D ON B.ID = D.benefit01id INNER JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON B.benefitspacketsid = Z.ID INNER JOIN subjectsdir R ON Z.subjectsdirID = R.ID WHERE ((SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) >= ${repmonth}::integer --входной параметр or ${repmonthby}::integer --входной параметр >= (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN '€нварь' then 1 WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) ) and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER --входной параметр and r.fedreg = ${spec.subjectsdir} group by r.name;
